Package org.planit.xml.zoning

Class UpdateZoning

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.planit.xml.zoning.UpdateZoning
  • public class UpdateZoning
extends Object
    This class contains methods to update the Zoning object using input values from the XML zoning input file.
    Author:
    gman6028
